custom.description: Whether the field is a custom field.

orderable.description: Whether the content of the field can be used to order lists.

navigable.description: Whether the field can be used as a column on the issue navigator.

searchable.description: Whether the content of the field can be searched.

clauseNames.description: The names that can be used to reference the field in an advanced search. For more information, see [Advanced searching - fields reference](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/gwORLQ).

project.description: The project the item has scope in.

self.description: The URL of the project details.

simplified.description: Whether or not the project is simplified.

avatarUrls.description: The URLs of the project's avatars.

16x16.description: The URL of the item's 16x16 pixel avatar.

24x24.description: The URL of the item's 24x24 pixel avatar.

32x32.description: The URL of the item's 32x32 pixel avatar.

48x48.description: The URL of the item's 48x48 pixel avatar.

projectCategory.description: The category the project belongs to.

self.description: The URL of the project category.

id.description: The ID of the project category.

description.description: The name of the project category.

name.description: The description of the project category.

schema.description: The data schema for the field.

type.description: The data type of the field.

items.description: When the data type is an array, the name of the field items within the array.

system.description: If the field is a system field, the name of the field.

custom.description: If the field is a custom field, the URI of the field.

customId.description: If the field is a custom field, the custom ID of the field.

configuration.description: If the field is a custom field, the configuration of the field.
